title: PUBM INVESTOR ALERT: Bronstein, Gewirtz & Grossman LLC Announces that PubMatic, Inc. Investors with Substantial Losses Have Opportunity to Lead Class Action Lawsuit
description: A class action lawsuit has been filed against PubMatic alleging the company made false or misleading statements about its business performance between February and August 2025, specifically related to ad spend and revenue reductions from a top DSP buyer.

title: CYTK INVESTOR ALERT: Bronstein, Gewirtz & Grossman LLC Announces that Cytokinetics, Incorporated Investors with Substantial Losses Have Opportunity to Lead Class Action Lawsuit
description: A class action lawsuit has been filed against Cytokinetics alleging false statements and misleading disclosures regarding its New Drug Application submission and FDA approval timeline for aficamten.

title: SVRA INVESTOR ALERT: Bronstein, Gewirtz & Grossman LLC Announces that Savara Inc. Investors with Substantial Losses Have Opportunity to Lead Class Action Lawsuit
description: A class action lawsuit has been filed against Savara Inc. alleging false and misleading statements about its MOLBREEVI BLA regulatory submission, potential FDA approval challenges, and capital raising needs.

title: QMCO INVESTOR ALERT: Bronstein, Gewirtz & Grossman LLC Announces that Quantum Corporation Investors with Substantial Losses Have Opportunity to Lead Class Action Lawsuit
description: A class action lawsuit has been filed against Quantum Corporation alleging improper revenue recognition and misleading financial statements during the period of November 15, 2024 to August 18, 2025.

title: LFMD INVESTOR ALERT: Bronstein, Gewirtz & Grossman LLC Announces that LifeMD, Inc. Investors with Substantial Losses Have Opportunity to Lead Class Action Lawsuit
description: A class action lawsuit has been filed against LifeMD, alleging false statements about the company's competitive position and financial guidance during May 7-August 5, 2025.
